Enhancing Community Resilience Programme (ECRP)
iati-activity.description: ECRP aims to strengthen the resilience of vulnerable communities in Malawi, due to climate change related effects like floods, droughts and changing weather conditions. This is in line with the Hyogo framework for action to reduce the losses and increasing resilience. ECRP is a consortium headed by Christian Aid, and works together with CARE and Action Aid, while 11 NGOs are implementing the work on the ground in 7 of the most vulnerable districts in Malawi. It aims to reach 305.000 community members directly through interventions like Disaster Risk Management, Village Savings and Loans, Conservation Agriculture, Irrigation, Post Harvest Management, Seed systems management, watershed management, agro-forestry, livestock and low carbon technologies (solar power and fuel efficient stoves).
To contribute to the achievement of improved livelihoods of some of the poorest and most marginalised people as part of resilient and thriving societies in nine DFID priority countries
